inclusion.criterion: Documented atherosclerotic stenosis in carotid artery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Statins treatment is indicated, following ANSM guidelines (French drug agency)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient or a legal representative signs consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is affiliated to social security system
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ischemic stroke/TIA due to arterial dissection (investigator judgment)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac source of embolism without documented atherosclerotic stenosis
exclusion.label: unknown
